properties.entry: SELECT correlation_id, process_id, status, created, modified FROM mu_process WHERE status >= 5 ORDER BY modified DESC
SELECT correlation_id, process_id, status, created, modified FROM mu_process WHERE status < 5 ORDER BY modified DESC
SELECT COUNT(*), status FROM mu_process GROUP BY status
SELECT correlation_id, process_id, status, created, modified FROM mu_process WHERE correlation_id = ?
UPDATE mu_process SET status = ?, modified = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE process_id = ?
INSERT INTO mu_process_step (process_id, step_id, class_name, method_name, parameters) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?)
DELETE FROM mu_process_step WHERE process_id = ? AND step_id = ?

SELECT proc.correlation_id, step.step_id, step.class_name, step.method_name, step.parameters, step.retries FROM mu_process_step step INNER JOIN mu_process proc ON proc.process_id = step.process_id WHERE proc.process_id = ? ORDER BY step_id DESC
UPDATE mu_process_step SET retries = retries + 1 WHERE process_id = ? AND step_id = ?
